issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps:
# open a field(textfield/textarea)
# enable Autocapitalization for it
# type something there
# move caret in the beginning of the line
# type something with small letters
Actual result: First letter is capitalized, caret moved into the end of line
Expected result: Caret should stay at the beginning of the line
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Autocapitalization moves caret at the end of line

comments.body: Closing ticket due to MobileWeb no longer being supported.
